# outputDecodeTimeStamp

**Instance Property**

The output decode timestamp of the sample buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
var outputDecodeTimeStamp: CMTime { get }
```

## Discussion

For consistency with [doc://com.apple.coremedia/documentation/CoreMedia/CMReadySampleBuffer/outputPresentationTimeStamp], this is calculated as: `OutputPresentationTimeStamp + ((DecodeTimeStamp - PresentationTimeStamp) / SpeedMultiplier)`.

- OutputPresentationTimeStamp is [doc://com.apple.coremedia/documentation/CoreMedia/CMReadySampleBuffer/outputPresentationTimeStamp] property of this sample buffer.
- PresentationTimeStamp is `presentationTimeStamp` property of this sample buffer.
- DecodeTimeStamp is [doc://com.apple.coremedia/documentation/CoreMedia/CMReadySampleBuffer/decodeTimeStamp] property of this sample buffer.
- SpeedMultiplier is the value of [doc://com.apple.coremedia/documentation/CoreMedia/CMSampleBuffer/AttachmentKey/speedMultiplier] attachment (default 1).
title: outputDecodeTimeStamp
